name: Brooks Ghost 13 Gore-Tex Invisible Fit Road Running - Men's
categories: Ghost 13 Gore-Tex Invisible Fit Road Running
description: This Brooks favourite high-mileage shoe offers soft comfort for wet weather pavement pounding. The Ghost 13 has been updated to include the super soft DNA LOFT foam throughout the entire foot, to cushiong your landing regardless of whether you're a heel or toe striker. Responsive midsoles, universal sprung platforms and segmented crash pads add flexibility and help smooth out the ride. The bonded waterproof-breathable membrane is lighter than previous versions so you can comfortably tackle trails though the wet months.Engineered Air Mesh uppers hold foot securely.GORE-TEX® Invisible Fit waterproof-breathable membrane is bonded directly to the upper.BioMoGo midsoles responds to each step for a custom ride at all speeds.Cushioning DNA LOFT in heel and toe provides cushion regardless of strike.Segmented crash pads cushion and stabilize your stride for smooth transitions.Omega flex grooves increase midsole flexibility.Soles are durable, high-performance rubber.
